T02D3167:184b-1: a'arya aa ba lo ke te shva ra s'a dha ni /
T02D3167:184b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3167:184b-4: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i
T02D3167:184b-5: rjes thogs la nam mkhar ra las nges par byung
T02D3167:184b-6: ba'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las
T02D3167:184b-7: byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje yongs su gyur pa
T02D3167:184b-8: las / rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o /
T02D3167:184b-9: de'i dbus su shin tu 'jigs pa dur khrod do //
T02D3167:184b-10: de'i yang dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgya dpa'o //
T02D3167:184b-11: de'i dbus su yang yi ge hr'i: sngon po las
T02D3167:184b-12: yang dag par byung ba bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
T02D3167:184b-13: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ste /
T02D3167:184b-14: sku mdog nag po g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
T02D3167:184b-15: zhal lnga pa spyan gsum pa phyag bcu gnyis pa
T02D3167:184b-16: g-yas kyi zhal gnyis ni dkar ba dang dmar ba'o
T02D3167:185a-0: // de bzhin du g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni ser po dang @185a * //
T02D3167:185a-2: g-yas kyi phyag rnams na ni da ma ru dang
T02D3167:185a-3: kha tv'am ga dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang
T02D3167:185a-4: rdo rje dang mda' bsnams pa'o //
T02D3167:185a-5: g-yon gyi phyag rnams na ni sdigs mdzub dang thod
T02D3167:185a-6: pa dang padma dmar po dang nor bu dang 'khor
T02D3167:185a-8: zhal thams cad kyang mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o //
T02D3167:185a-9: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa 'dzag pa dang lnga
T02D3167:185a-10: pa'i mgo bo phreng bas sku la rgyan du byas
T02D3167:185a-11: pa gcer bu sku thams cad kyang shin tu mdzes
T02D3167:185a-12: par bdag nyid skad cig gis rtogs par byas la
T02D3167:185a-13: / dus phyis snying gar zla ba la yi ge
T02D3167:185a-14: hr'i: dbus su chud par aom a'a: h'um zhes bya
T02D3167:185a-15: / ba'o // mu ni ba ra badzre h'um dza:
T02D3167:185a-16: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di phreng ba byas la bzlas
T02D3167:185a-17: / ba'o // pa bya ba'o // mtshams med pa
T02D3167:185a-18: lnga byas pa nams kyis kyang 'bum bzlas na 'grub
T02D3167:185a-19: / ba'o // pa bya ba'o // bo // sgyu
T02D3167:185a-20: 'phrul gyi dra ba'i lugs kyi 'phags pa spyan ras
T02D3167:185a-21: gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
